sentences.en: Aircraft production continued to plod along at an agonizingly slow pace.
sentences.cn: 飞机制造业仍旧举步维艰，发展速度之缓很让人头疼。

sentences.en: As for prevention, progress has been agonizingly slow.
sentences.cn: 对于癌症预防的研究也十分缓慢.

sentences.en: I feel that same process happening here, albeit agonizingly slowly.
sentences.cn: 我感受到同样的进程正在这里发生, 虽然痛苦而缓慢.

sentences.en: If it were real, that would have been agonizingly painful.
sentences.cn: 如果那是真的, 刚才打那几下就会很痛的.
进展的缓慢让人备受煎熬。

sentences.en: Something hit the back of his neck an agonizingly painful blow.
sentences.cn: 不知什么东西在他后颈部打了一下,他感到疼痛不堪.
进展的速度慢得令人难以忍受.

sentences.en: The tortoise along at an agonizingly slow speed.
sentences.cn: 那只乌龟以让人难受的慢速度爬行着.

sentences.en: The tortoise crept along at agonizingly slow speed.
sentences.cn: 乌龟以极以缓慢的速度爬行着.

sentences.en: The tortoise crept along at an agonizingly slow speed.
sentences.cn: 乌龟以极其缓慢的速度爬行着.

sentences.en: They were at least agonizingly aware of the easy money in the vicinity.
sentences.cn: 他们最起码都揪心地意识到,近在眼前就有唾手可得的钱.

sentences.en: Today I'm semi - alert, but unable to sleep agonizingly scared.
sentences.cn: 今天我总也无法入睡,内心苦闷而恐惧.

sentences.en: Yet, to many, data transmission via mobile phones and P. D. A. S is agonizingly slow.
sentences.cn: 但是在许多人看来, 借助移动电话和P. D. A. S.传输数据速度慢得让人着急.

words.tran_cn: 感到极度痛苦的，苦闷的
使极度痛苦（agonize的过去分词）
使极度痛苦；折磨（agonize的ing形式）
